name: WhistlePig 18 Year Double Malt Rye: 2nd Edition
description: A long and patiently aged whiskey is only as good as the grain it’s born from. With our oldest expression to date, we’re tapping into the time-honored techniques of the farmer distillers who invented the category in America’s early days.
tastingNotes:
NOSE: Sweet and aromatic, with toasted oak, berries, and nutmeg.
PALATE: Elegant and spicy, mildly fruity, and pleasantly floral. Vanilla and oak notes appear with time.
FINISH: Wonderfully long, clean, and spicy finish.
